testcase.classname: Searching for an item byRS Stock Number using Quick Order search
testcase.name: Search for an item by stock number test
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the default page of the application...........................passed When I search for an item by RS stock "912-0239" and "1" and click on Add to Basket button.passed Then I should be able to see details of the item searched "FLIR E4 Thermal Imaging Camera, Temp Range: -20 → +250 °C 80 x 60pixel RS Cal" in the basket.passed
